classes.docstring:
"""
    Abstract CBV mixin that gives access mixins the same customizable
    functionality.
    """
classes.name: AccessMixin

classes.docstring: """Verify that the current user is authenticated."""
classes.name: LoginRequiredMixin

classes.docstring: """Verify that the current user has all specified permissions."""
classes.name: PermissionRequiredMixin

classes.docstring:
"""
    Deny a request with a permission error if the test_func() method returns
    False.
    """
classes.name: UserPassesTestMixin
